Description: 7 beads in different sizes and material. A: Four cylindrical segmented beads made of white faience, no coloured glaze preserved, most of them broken off. B: one spherical bead made of white faience with a circumferential edge on both sides. C: two disc-shaped beads, one smaller made of faience, one larger made of ostrich eggshell.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
